intro: Drosanthemum pulverulentum, commonly known as the dusty drosanthemum, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It is a member of the Aizoaceae family, known for its succulent leaves and vibrant flowers. The plant features small, clustered flowers that range in color from pink to purple, often blooming in summer. Its leaves are typically covered in a fine, powdery coating, giving it a distinctive appearance. It is well adapted to arid environments and requires minimal water once established.
